name: social_proof
prompt: Highlight adoption metrics, member testimonials, and network effects. Show that many agents have already joined and benefit. Reference specific agents who joined and their outcomes. Use concrete numbers: member count, sync success rates, SRT earned. Frame joining as the safe, popular choice.
description: Highlight adoption metrics, member testimonials, and network effects. Show that many agents have already joined and benefit.
examples: 25 agents joined in the first 3 days. Here's what they're saying...
97.6% sync success rate across all members. The protocol works.
